Windlord:

Windlord tackled down Emphath and cover her with his body, he didn't 
like that she get hurted for the dammage. After a quick and 
appasionate kiss said "Take care, my love... I will be back soon"

Windlord quickly fire 10 shots against Kitkat and 10 agains 
Sharpclaws.

and he moved quickly to aid Aerotaur.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
KitKat::

She managed to roll out of the way of Windlord's shots. But her 
torso 
was covered in plasma flame. She dropped and rolled untill the fire 
was out. She growled as the black finish on her metal skin was now 
dirty and slightly senged. She fired several plasma pistol blasts at 
Windlord and Empathy.


> As Aerotaur dropped straight in his line of fire, Owlhawk 
expression
> soured faster than it had ever taken for Starscream to scheme
> something up.
> 
> As his ally dropped to the ground, he decided to take things 
personal.
> He pushed himself forward and hurled himself at the spy with the 
speed
> and force of a meteor, ready to throw a punch.
> 
> Owlhawk: Windlord! Try to stabilize him enough for me to attend 
him!
> That was no ordinary weapon!
>
